title: Mastering Instructional Design Research Methodologies: Focus on Case Studies and Design-Based Research

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and awareness of educational technology trends
context.additional_context: Learners are ordinary citizens supporting social studies education in elementary schools, possessing mobile device proficiency and digital literacy. They require a combination of small-group activities and individual learning.

learning_goals: Compare and explain core methodologies of instructional design case studies and design-based research
Develop instructional design research plans applicable to real educational scenarios
Improve design quality using formative assessment tools optimized for mobile environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
